com.scriptrts.core.ui
Class MapPainter

java.lang.Object
  com.scriptrts.core.ui.MapPainter

public class MapPainter
extends java.lang.Object

Painter which displays map terrain tiles on the screen.

Field Summary

          Whether or not to draw debug lines on the map.

          Whether to disable masking (for speed purposes).
static boolean USE_FOG_OF_WAR
          Whether or not to use fog of war.

Constructor Detail

MapPainter

public MapPainter(Map map,
                  int tileX,
                  int tileY)
Constructor which takes a map and an initial tile size, and initializes all necessary elements of the painter

Parameters:
map - map to draw
tileX - horizontal size of each tile
tileY - vertical size of each tile (should be half of horizontal size)

Parameters:

j - y coordinates of tile
Returns:
(x, y) graphical screen coordinates of tile

getTileAtPoint

public java.awt.Point getTileAtPoint(java.awt.Point point,
                                     Viewport viewport)
Get the tile that is at a given point on the map

Parameters:
point - screen coordinates of the desired tile
viewport - viewport that is being used to view map
Returns:
(i, j) map coordinates of tile that was clicked on

update

public void update()
Signifies that the input map to this map painter was changed, and that the map painter should change its internal state to reflect the change in the map.

                                  Viewport viewport)
Get the bounds on the viewport in terms of tiles

Parameters:
bounds - integer array in which the bounds are stored
viewport - viewport used to display map
